overview: Refused Are Fucking Dead is a 2006 documentary about the punk band Refused and the last year of their career. The film was directed by the band's guitarist, Kristofer Steen. It includes live performances of "Spectre," "Life Support Addiction," "Circlepit," "New Noise," and "Rather Be Dead."
tagline: Refused are dead. They spent their last year in existence touring godforsaken hellholes scattered around the western world. This is their testament!
title: Refused Are Fucking Dead
